attributes.action: Parliament must deliver on the Referendum result and leave the EU with no delay.
attributes.background: The public voted, by a majority, in 2016 to leave the EU. The public did not vote to be ignored. Parliament has done all it can, with the aid of The Speaker, to thwart Brexit .  This petition demands we leave the EU by 12th April 2019, with or without a deal but definitely with no further delay.
